parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From a compound of a and a derivative of tithemi; to set aside, i.e. to disesteem, neutralize or violate.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Or Moses, or Mouses of Hebrew origin; Moseus, Moses, or Mouses, the Hebrew lawgiver.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
Pity, compassion, favor, grace, mercy. From oikteiro; pity.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
Three. Or neuter tria a primary number; 'three'.
A witness (judicially) or figuratively (genitive case); by analogy, a 'martyr'.
